treatment-md.title: Transversotrema atkinsoni Hunter & Cribb, 2012, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: A cryptic complex of species related to Transversotrema licinum Manter, 1970 from fishes of the Indo-West Pacific, including descriptions of ten new species of Transversotrema Witenberg, 1944 (Digenea: Transversotrematidae)
